name: Strawberry Banana Smoothie
description: A refreshing smoothie made with ripe bananas, fresh strawberries, and a touch of honey.
instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender.
cookingNote: For a thicker texture, add more frozen strawberries or ice cubes.

name: Mango Pineapple Smoothie
description: A tropical smoothie with a burst of mango and pineapple flavors, perfect for a refreshing snack.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender.
Pour into a glass and enjoy.
cookingNote: Add a little ice if you prefer a colder smoothie.

name: Green Detox Smoothie
description: A healthy green smoothie made with spinach, apple, and chia seeds for a detox boost.
instructions: Blend spinach, apple, cucumber, chia seeds, coconut water, and lemon juice.
cookingNote: For added sweetness, try adding a few dates or honey.

name: Berry Protein Smoothie
description: A protein-packed smoothie made with mixed berries, protein powder, and almond milk.
instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender.
Serve and enjoy as a post-workout drink.
cookingNote: Add more almond milk if you prefer a thinner consistency.

name: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie
description: A rich and creamy smoothie with the delicious combination of peanut butter and banana.
instructions: Add all ingredients into a blender.
cookingNote: For a vegan version, substitute the Greek yogurt with a plant-based yogurt.
